TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, you get it and you are happy.

I wish for a properly colored, regular Lego scale Remote control Lego Liebherr R9800 mining excavator with all the Lego pieces (Including moving/controllable parts) the instructions, and the proper app downloaded on my phone so I can control it, all of this delivered safely to me on Earth without Earth imploding or exploding, without me having any medical issues or conditions, and without my house being destroyed, and I wish to be happy once I get it, even without other Lego mining equipment. Please read wish carefully.

(Ninja'd, but this changes nothing, just proves my theory. See below.)

Granted. You realize that actually you are @Ben J. Kerman, his alternative personality.

I wish to always have when I need them any and all Lego pieces ever made to make any model I want at any time in any colours I want and the perfect recall and the amazing creativity required to do so with no physical, mental or medical drawbacks that would stop me from doing so. No natural or non natural disasters. Only the amounts I need at the time, no being crushed under anything, no drowning in anything, no dying from old age or suddenly having my current age suddenly change. No sentient, AI or remote controlled/programmed entities of any kind ruining my fun. No making everybody else on Earth or the greater universe disappear. No changing my mind to not enjoy what I am building, no having the materials or models suddenly disappear until I am ready to let them go.
